<image 1> The work in the image shows the influence of Western art in its use of

A. classical contrapposto
B. atmospheric perspective
C. Di sotto in sù
D. tenebrism

The work in the image does not show the influence of Western art in its use of classical contrapposto, atmospheric perspective, di sotto in sù, or tenebrism. Instead, it appears to be an example of Persian miniature painting, characterized by intricate details and a flat, two-dimensional style. Therefore, none of the options provided (A, B, C, or D) accurately describe the influence of Western art in this particular image.
